title: Is "Trump" considered racist/hate speech and is it reportable?
body:
I realize that not all trump supporters are racist, but after the thousands of hate crimes committed in his name recently, it's starting to feel like **insert derogatory term for... any race... /women**

I know riot has a stance on negative/passive aggressive/griefing, but i'm not entirely sure if this is a subject that is "don't discuss it in the game because of how much it triggers people" kind of thing.

I am curious on riot's stance on this topic, because it REALLY feels like racism/sexism. and i've never seen someone bring up this topic where someone doesn't either bite their tongue and say nothing, or just triggers people and incites a rage inducing conversation in chat.

Either way, the subject seems to end with an overall negative experience for the players.
